original_text: If I rejoice because my wealth was great, and because mine hand had gotten much;
korean_text: 만일 재물의 풍부함과 손으로 얻은 것이 많음으로 기뻐하였다면

sentences.original_text: If I rejoice because my wealth was great
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 내 재산이 컸기 때문에 기뻐했다면

sentences.original_text: and because mine hand had gotten much
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 손이 많은 것을 얻었기 때문이라면
